product_name: Novara Mezzo Road Bike Shorts - Women's
long_description: For weekend and century rides, the Novara Mezzo 8-panel bike shorts for women have a Gelspot chamois for comfort and performance during long hours in the saddle. 4-way stretch fabric and 8-panel construction provide support for hard-working muscles; moisture-wicking, quick-drying finish increases comfort. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Novara Gelspot chamois features a microfiber covering that wicks moisture away; ergonomic shaping and smooth, sonic-welded seams reduce friction. Women-specific, ergonomically shaped Gelspot chamois conforms to body contours; high-density foam provides comfort on the bike. Ultrasoft, breathable chamois is fully elasticized for flex and stretch. Wide 2 in. waistband provides soft, nonbinding support and flexibility. Rear envelope style pocket self closes to keep small items secure. Compression hem cuffs keep shorts from riding up legs without the use of elastic or silicon. Mesh back panel ventilates and allows moisture vapor to escape quickly. Novara Mezzo bike shorts feature flatseam construction that is soft and non-chafing next to skin.
